welcome.title: Welcome to Hanuman Caterers
welcome.subtitle: Authentic Flavors, Exceptional Service
welcome.description: Experience the divine taste of traditional Indian cuisine crafted with love and devotion. From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, we make every occasion memorable.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: With over 50+ years of experience, Hanuman Caterers has been serving authentic Indian cuisine that brings families and communities together. Our commitment to quality ingredients, traditional recipes, and exceptional service has made us the trusted choice for countless celebrations across Mumbai.
